root.name: Delve Deeper
root.description: OverviewThe idea of Delve Deeper is to have a higher score at the end of the match than the other teams. Points are earned by adventuring into the cave system to find and recover precious minerals and treasure. Along the way you will also fight the "Evil" goblin team,who's sole purpose is to find and temporarily disable the dwarven teams units through combat.PC System RequirementsOS: Windows XP SP2 or better, Windows Vista, Windows 7Processor: 1.4 GHzMemory: 512 MBGraphics: Must Support Shader Model 2.0DirectXÂ®: DirectX 9Hard Drive: 60 MB
